name: SoftActivity
tag_list: internet-monitoring, employee-monitoring, time-management, productivity, monitoring, parental-control, keylogger
overview:
Established in 2000 and based in Vancouver area, British Columbia, Canada, SoftActivity (subsidiary of Deep Software Inc.) specializes in the development of computer monitoring security software for small and medium-sized businesses as well as home PC users worldwide. The company has more than a decade of experience in computer security and was one of the first to develop a corporate monitoring solution.

SoftActivity products include Activity Monitor, software solution for companies that tracks employees’ computer usage and protects from cyber slacking, theft of intellectual property and visiting of inappropriate websites at work. It helps to improve company staff productivity. SoftActivity TS Monitor records remote workers, administrators or students activity on company’s terminal servers. SoftActivity Keylogger software allows parents to protect their children from modern cyber threats by monitoring their Internet and computer activity on their home PC.

SoftActivity products track and record: screen images of user actions, visited websites, used apps, Email, IM chats, typed text, social networking, file operations, log on/log off times and more. All recorded information is securely encrypted and is stored on the customer’s computers. Free trial is available on the company’s website
